translations: 芭蕾舞剧（ballet 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: 'Swan Lake' is one of the great classical ballets.
sentences.translation: 《天鹅湖》是一部伟大的古典芭蕾舞剧。

sentences.sentence: The performance will include the premiere of three new ballets.
sentences.translation: 这次演出将包括3部新芭蕾舞剧的首演。

sentences.sentence: One of the most beloved ballets is “Swan Lake.”
sentences.translation: 最为人们喜爱的芭蕾舞剧是“天鹅湖”。
